item.title: Home Assistant
item.description: Details> Details # This is a template to add this container to your nas setup full functional with matching permissions and settings that of lochnas repo. Original maintainer homeassistant/home-assistant How to enable> How to enable # Edit your /lochnas/docker-templates/homeassistant/.
